title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed via a clean async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM, chat and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming and async support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: llama-cpp-ollama
summary: Discussion thread explaining how llama.cpp powers Ollama’s local inference engine.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: VS Code & Neovim plugins that expose Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper with markdown, syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-kotlin-sdk
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama targeting JVM, Android & iOS.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency-injection friendly.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection & autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build & run Ollama deterministically on NixOS.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama REST endpoints.
